message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to make you an offer. After careful consideration, I'm willing to sell this incredible product to you for $950000. This is a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product, and I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I see in the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you a revised price of $900000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value I place on the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to pay $825000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I see in the product.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not comfortable going as low as $825000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you a revised price of $875000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value I place on the product.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm getting close to my limit. I'm willing to pay $800000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I see in the product.
